title: Cant open
body: So, ive tried redownloading the newest version of league.  Ive tried opening the league client via admin, and lol launcher via admin.  Neither works. ive tried deleting the lol.launcher file, and haveing it re dowload that. still doesnt work.... idwtf is going on. i just wanna play league. can someone help me please

replies.body:
If you're trying to launch the patcher and it just never responds and doesn't give you any kind of error, it sounds like your OS might be blocking the program from running at all. This can happen sometimes if you don't have all the right permissions in place to tell your OS that league is okay to run.

Check out our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those setup, Hit me back up if you have any questions!
